name: correspondent

correspondent noun [C]
(REPORTER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person employed by a newspaper, a television station, etc. to report on a particular subject or send reports from a foreign country: a war correspondent the education correspondent for the Guardian
More examplesFewer examplesIn her latest dispatch, Clare Duggan, our war correspondent, reported an increase in fighting.She spoke emotionally about her experiences as a war correspondent.Our foreign correspondent filed this report earlier today.Perhaps her most productive period was her five-year stint as a foreign correspondent in New York.Our racing correspondent has the following tips for the 3.15 and the 3.45 at Newmarket .
